data.contentText: Only blue fields need to be completed

fields.label: How is the feeding?
fields.values:
NFY,Has not had a breast feed yet 
BF,Breast feeding normally
BFH,Needs help breast feeding
CSP,Needs cup or spoon
NG,Refusing all feeds: Needs NG
IVF,Requires IV fluids
BOT,Bottle feeding

fields.label: Meconium?
fields.values:
MecLiq,Meconium present at delivery
Mec24,Passed meconium in 1st 24 hrs
NoMec,No meconium in 1st 24 hrs

fields.label: Stools?
fields.values:
Norm,Opening bowels normally
BNO,Bowels not opening
Diarr,Has diarrhoea and passing large water stools
BlDi,Bloody Diarrhoea

fields.label: Passing urine?
fields.values:
Yes,Has passed urine in 1st 24 hrs
No,Has not passed urine
Unk,Not sure

fields.label: Passing urine?
fields.values:
Norm,Passing urine normally
NoPU,Not passing urine
